property.name: theSQL
property.value: SELECT distinct a.vc2key as vc2key, c.vc2value AS NUMGWID, d.vc2gatewayname as VC2GATEWAYNAME, a.numtaskid AS NUMTASKID FROM (SELECT DISTINCT a.numtaskid, a.vc2key, a.vc2value FROM tl_alert_kpi_log a WHERE a.datcreatetime BETWEEN to_date('{0}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date('{1}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND a.vc2key = 'CONNECTION_STATUS') a, tl_task_opt b, tl_task_opt_item c, tl_gateway d WHERE a.numtaskid = b.NUMTASKID AND b.NUMOPTID = c.NUMOPTID AND c.VC2VALUE = d.NUMGWID AND c.VC2KEY = 'gatewayId' AND a.vc2key = 'CONNECTION_STATUS' AND d.numstatus = 1 and a.numtaskid {2} IN (SELECT DISTINCT a.numtaskid FROM tl_alert_kpi_log a WHERE a.datcreatetime BETWEEN to_date('{0}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date('{1}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND a.vc2key = 'CONNECTION_STATUS' AND a.vc2value = 'true')

property.name: theSQL
property.value: SELECT count(1)as nums FROM tl_alert_kpi_log a WHERE a.datcreatetime BETWEEN to_date('{0}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date('{1}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND a.vc2key = 'CONNECTION_STATUS'

property.name: theSQL
property.value: select t1.numtaskid as NUMTASKID, t5.vc2gatewayname as VC2GATEWAYNAME, t5.NUMGWID as NUMGWID, RESPONSE_ERROR , RESPONSE_COUNT, decode(RESPONSE_COUNT,0,0,RESPONSE_ERROR/RESPONSE_COUNT) as RESPONSE_ERROR_PCT from (select a.numtaskid, max(vc2value + 1) - min(a.vc2value + 1) as RESPONSE_ERROR from tl_alert_kpi_log a where a.datcreatetime between to_date('{0}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('{1}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.vc2key = 'RESPONSE_ERROR' group by a.numtaskid) t1, (select b.numtaskid, max(b.vc2value + 1) - min(b.vc2value + 1) as RESPONSE_COUNT from tl_alert_kpi_log b where b.datcreatetime between to_date('{0}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('{1}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and b.vc2key = 'RESPONSE_COUNT' group by b.numtaskid) t2, tl_task_opt t3 , tl_task_opt_item t4 , tl_gateway t5 where t1.numtaskid = t2.numtaskid and t1.numtaskid = t3.NUMTASKID and t3.NUMOPTID = t4.NUMOPTID and t4.VC2KEY = 'gatewayId' and t4.VC2VALUE = t5.NUMGWID and t5.numstatus = 1

property.name: theSQL
property.value: select t1.numtaskid as NUMTASKID, t5.vc2gatewayname as VC2GATEWAYNAME, t5.NUMGWID as NUMGWID, RPT_FAIL_COUNT , RPT_COUNT, decode(RPT_COUNT,0,0,RPT_FAIL_COUNT/RPT_COUNT) as RPT_ERROR_PCT from (select a.numtaskid, max(vc2value + 1) - min(a.vc2value + 1) as RPT_FAIL_COUNT from tl_alert_kpi_log a where a.datcreatetime between to_date('{0}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('{1}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.vc2key = 'RPT_FAIL_COUNT' group by a.numtaskid) t1, (select b.numtaskid, max(b.vc2value + 1) - min(b.vc2value + 1) as RPT_COUNT from tl_alert_kpi_log b where b.datcreatetime between to_date('{0}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('{1}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and b.vc2key = 'RPT_COUNT' group by b.numtaskid) t2, tl_task_opt t3 , tl_task_opt_item t4 , tl_gateway t5 where t1.numtaskid = t2.numtaskid and t1.numtaskid = t3.NUMTASKID and t3.NUMOPTID = t4.NUMOPTID and t4.VC2KEY = 'gatewayId' and t4.VC2VALUE = t5.NUMGWID and t5.numstatus = 1

property.name: theSQL
property.value: select e.NUMGWID AS NUMGWID, e.VC2GATEWAYNAME, e.NUMTASKID, nvl(f.avg_sms_delay,-1) AS SMS_DELAY from (SELECT c.vc2value AS NUMGWID, d.VC2GATEWAYNAME, a.NUMTASKID FROM tl_alert_kpi_log a, tl_task_opt b, tl_task_opt_item c, tl_gateway d WHERE a.datcreatetime BETWEEN to_date('{0}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date('{1}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND a.numtaskid = b.NUMTASKID AND b.NUMOPTID = c.NUMOPTID AND c.VC2VALUE = d.NUMGWID AND c.VC2KEY = 'gatewayId' AND a.vc2key = 'SMS_DELAY' GROUP BY c.vc2value, d.vc2gatewayname, a.numtaskid) e left join (select k.numtaskid, avg(k.vc2value) as avg_sms_delay from tl_alert_kpi_log k where k.vc2value > -1 and k.vc2key = 'SMS_DELAY' and k.datcreatetime BETWEEN to_date('{0}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date('{1}', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by k.numtaskid) f on e.NUMTASKID = f.numtaskid

property.name: theSQL
property.value: delete from tl_alert_log_data where numalerttypeid = {0} and numgwid = {1}

property.name: theSQL
property.value: delete from tl_alert_log where NUMTYPEID = {0} and NUMGWID = {1}

property.name: theSQL
property.value: select tg.vc2gatewayname, tg.numgwid, tg.numstatus, tt.numtaskid, t.numalertid, t.numstate, nvl(t.sms_delay,0) as sms_delay_average from tl_gateway tg, (select ta.numgwid, ta.numalertid, ta.numtaskid, ta.numstate, (select trim(to_char(t2.vc2value, 99999999999990)) from tl_alert_log_data t2 where t2.numalertid = ta.numalertid and t2.vc2key = 'SMS_DELAY') as sms_delay from tl_alert_log ta where ta.numalertid in (select max(numalertid) as numalertid from tl_alert_log where numtypeid = 4 group by numgwid)) t, tl_task_opt tt, (select * from tl_task_opt_item ti where ti.vc2key='gatewayId') ti where tg.numgwid = t.numgwid(+) and tg.numgwid = ti.vc2value and tt.numoptid = ti.numoptid and tg.numstatus = 1 order by tg.numgwid

property.name: theSQL
property.value:
select tg.vc2gatewayname, tg.numgwid, tg.numstatus, tt.numtaskid, t.numalertid, t.numstate, nvl(t.rpt_count,0) as rpt_count, nvl(t.rpt_fail_count,0) as rpt_fail_count, nvl(t.rpt_error_pct,0) as rpt_error_pct from tl_gateway tg, (select ta.numgwid, ta.numalertid, ta.numtaskid, ta.numstate, (select t2.vc2value from tl_alert_log_data t2 where t2.numalertid = ta.numalertid and t2.vc2key = 'RPT_COUNT') as rpt_count, (select t2.vc2value from tl_alert_log_data t2 where t2.numalertid = ta.numalertid and t2.vc2key = 'RPT_FAIL_COUNT') as rpt_fail_count, (select trim(to_char(t2.vc2value * 100, 9990.09)) || '%' from tl_alert_log_data t2 where t2.numalertid = ta.numalertid and t2.vc2key = 'RPT_ERROR_PCT') as rpt_error_pct from tl_alert_log ta where ta.numalertid in (select max(numalertid) as numalertid from tl_alert_log where numtypeid = 3 group by numgwid)
) t, tl_task_opt tt, (select * from tl_task_opt_item ti where ti.vc2key='gatewayId') ti where tg.numgwid = t.numgwid(+) and tg.numgwid = ti.vc2value and tt.numoptid = ti.numoptid and tg.numstatus =1 order by tg.numgwid

property.name: theSQL
property.value: select tg.vc2gatewayname, tg.numgwid, tg.numstatus, tt.numtaskid, t.numalertid, t.numstate, nvl(t.response_count,0) as response_count, nvl(t.response_error,0) as response_error, nvl(t.response_error_pct,0) as response_error_pct from tl_gateway tg, (select ta.numgwid, ta.numalertid, ta.numtaskid, ta.numstate, (select t2.vc2value from tl_alert_log_data t2 where t2.numalertid = ta.numalertid and t2.vc2key = 'RESPONSE_COUNT') as response_count, (select t2.vc2value from tl_alert_log_data t2 where t2.numalertid = ta.numalertid and t2.vc2key = 'RESPONSE_ERROR') as response_error, (select trim(to_char(t2.vc2value * 100, 9990.09)) || '%' from tl_alert_log_data t2 where t2.numalertid = ta.numalertid and t2.vc2key = 'RESPONSE_ERROR_PCT') as response_error_pct from tl_alert_log ta where ta.numalertid in (select max(numalertid) as numalertid from tl_alert_log where numtypeid = 2 group by numgwid)) t, tl_task_opt tt, (select * from tl_task_opt_item ti where ti.vc2key='gatewayId') ti where tg.numgwid = t.numgwid(+) and tg.numgwid = ti.vc2value and tt.numoptid = ti.numoptid and tg.numstatus =1 order by tg.numgwid

property.name: theSQL
property.value: select tg.vc2gatewayname, tg.numgwid, tg.numstatus, tt.numtaskid, t.numalertid, t.numstate, t.CONNECTION_STATUS from tl_gateway tg, (select ta.numgwid, ta.numalertid, ta.numtaskid, ta.numstate, td.vc2value as CONNECTION_STATUS from tl_alert_log ta, tl_alert_log_data td where ta.numalertid in (select max(numalertid) as numalertid from tl_alert_log where numtypeid = 1 group by numgwid) and ta.numalertid = td.numalertid and td.vc2key = 'CONNECTION_STATUS') t, tl_task_opt tt, (select * from tl_task_opt_item ti where ti.vc2key='gatewayId') ti where tg.numgwid = t.numgwid(+) and tg.numgwid = ti.vc2value and tt.numoptid = ti.numoptid and tg.numstatus =1 order by tg.numgwid

property.name: theSQL
property.value: select distinct tg.numgwid, tg.vc2gatewayname, t.numalertid, t.numtypeid, t.numstate, t1.numtaskid, t.response_count, t.response_error, t.response_error_pct, t.rpt_count, t.rpt_fail_count, t.rpt_error_pct, t.sms_delay as sms_delay_average from tl_gateway tg, (select tal.numalertid, tal.numtypeid, tal.numstate, tal.numtaskid, tal.numgwid, t3.vc2gatewayname, (select t2.vc2value from tl_alert_log_data t2 where t2.numalertid = tal.numalertid and t2.vc2key = 'RESPONSE_COUNT') as response_count, (select t2.vc2value from tl_alert_log_data t2 where t2.numalertid = tal.numalertid and t2.vc2key = 'RESPONSE_ERROR') as response_error, (select trim(to_char(t2.vc2value * 100, 9990.09)) || '%' from tl_alert_log_data t2 where t2.numalertid = tal.numalertid and t2.vc2key = 'RESPONSE_ERROR_PCT') as response_error_pct, (select t2.vc2value from tl_alert_log_data t2 where t2.numalertid = tal.numalertid and t2.vc2key = 'RPT_COUNT') as rpt_count, (select t2.vc2value from tl_alert_log_data t2 where t2.numalertid = tal.numalertid and t2.vc2key = 'RPT_FAIL_COUNT') as rpt_fail_count, (select trim(to_char(t2.vc2value * 100, 9990.09)) || '%' from tl_alert_log_data t2 where t2.numalertid = tal.numalertid and t2.vc2key = 'RPT_ERROR_PCT') as rpt_error_pct, (select trim(to_char(t2.vc2value, 99999999999990)) from tl_alert_log_data t2 where t2.numalertid = tal.numalertid and t2.vc2key = 'SMS_DELAY') as sms_delay from tl_alert_log tal, (select t1.numgwid, max(t1.datupdatetime) as datupdatetime from tl_alert_log t1 where t1.numtypeid = {0} group by t1.numgwid) t2, tl_gateway t3 where tal.numgwid = t2.numgwid and tal.datupdatetime = t2.datupdatetime and tal.numtypeid = {0} and tal.numgwid = t3.numgwid) t, (select ttoi.vc2value as numgwid, tt.numtaskid from tl_task tt, tl_task_opt tto, tl_task_opt_item ttoi where tt.numtaskid = tto.numtaskid and tto.numoptid = ttoi.numoptid and ttoi.vc2key = 'gatewayId' and tto.numtypeid = 1) t1 where t.numgwid(+) = tg.numgwid and t1.numgwid(+) = tg.numgwid

property.name: theSQL
property.value: select * from tl_alert_log_data t1 where t1.numalertid ={0}
